original_text: He waited for seven more days. Then he sent the dove out again. This time, it did not return to Noah.
korean_text: 또 칠 일을 기다려 비둘기를 내놓으매 다시는 그에게로 돌아오지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: He waited for seven more days.
Then he sent the dove out again.
This time, it did not return to Noah.
